title: Daring
description: Follow bestselling, award-winning author Jillian Hunter to the glittering world of Regency Scotland, where Connor Buchanan, Lord Advocate of Scotland, a defender of the innocent to some and a heartless scoundrel to others, catches a charming thief that is bold, beautiful, and positively daring. Some call Maggie Saunders a perfect angel, but to Connor she is nothing but trouble. Breaking into his house on a misguided mission of mercy, Maggie finds herself face-to-face with the infamous “Devil’s Advocate” himself. Deceived by Maggie’s appearance of fragile innocence, Connor is enchanted…until he learns the truth of her larcenous scheme. For the first time, the almighty Highlander has met his match in a woman half his size. With a kiss, she captivates him…and with a shocking act of bravery, she draws him into a dangerous secret. Now, Connor must risk everything to obey the irresistible laws of love.
author: Jillian Hunter
